4312020.name: WTF: Wheels Tires and Flesh
4312020.description:
Get ready for total destruction in a game that blends the roguelike progression of Vampire Survivors with the explosive vehicle combat of classic games like Twisted Metal.

Set in a zombie-infested post-apocalyptic world, you take control of a weaponized war vehicle and face endless hordes of enemies in fast-paced, chaotic battles. Run over zombies, unleash devastating weapons, survive as long as possible, and turn every run into a fight for survival.

Collect relics from the old world, unlock permanent upgrades, and evolve your vehicle with insane weapons, abilities, and modifications. Every run is different: choose how to build your car, combine upgrades, and adapt your strategy to overcome increasingly dangerous missions.

Designed for players who love constant action, deep customization, and that irresistible “just one more run” feeling.
4312020.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
